channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bagged to waste outside number 22 Blenheim Terrace, 4th October
item.description:
There are two bags of garbage left illegally by the tree outside number 22 Blenheim Terrace can you please collect and also investigate? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blenheim Terrace, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping under shrubs, 4th October
item.description:
Fly tipping is accumulating under the shrubs in front of the windows, and no cleaning nor maintenance has been done in the past several months. There is a toaster just visible under the branches, as well as clothing, cans and bottles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Villas Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car dumbed for over 1 year, 4th October
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned bike chained to railings, and flytipped headboard., 4th October
item.description:
The bike has been there for a very long time now, so am quite sure it has been abandoned. The headboard has been flytipped around a month or two ago.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Park Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins overflowing, 3rd October
item.description:
New people have moved into 124 and 124A, but bins are overflowing after not being collected for a few weeks. Foxes are tearing bins pet and rubbish getting out. It will not be long before rats get at this. Lots of young kids in area as opposite school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Horsa Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Green waste still not removed, 3rd October
item.description:
Further to my recent posts, the pile of built up green waste at that the back of the small pond ( the one nearest to playground) has still not been removed. The pile over the other side of the park has been but this pile is building up and not being removed. Debris around it also building up again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins taking up half pavement, 3rd October
item.description:
Bins have been on the pavement for weeks. At 20 York avenue. You can only get past one at a time and barely get a pram through. You cannot walk together holding a child’s hand There is plenty of room on the drive to store them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, York Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
